key.name: first-run
key.summary: Determines if this is the first time the application is launched
key.description: On first run, the application should create an autostart entry.

key.name: dark-mode
key.summary: Sets the preferred application theme settings
key.description: true means that every application will use the dark theme. false means that every application will use the light theme

key.name: enable-auto-switch
key.summary: Enables automatically switching from dark to light modes at sunrise and sunset.
key.description: Enabling this makes it so that closing the application just hides the window. The indicator will appear in the wingpanel and show the current mode status

key.name: enable-dark-desktop

key.description: Prefer dark application themes. Sets the global dark
